messages.subject: Star
messages.msgSnippet: Star,  Hi!    I am unschooling in England also, in Yorkshire, to be more precise.  I was on the UK Home-ed List, but left due to some strange behaviour from
messages.messageBody:
Star, Hi! I am unschooling in England also, in Yorkshire, to be more
precise. I was on the UK Home-ed List, but left due to some strange
behaviour from another list member. Anyway, welcome, I don't say much here,
but you're welcome to mail me direct...

Regards
Tracy

_____________________________________________________________
>
> Message: 20
> Date: Sun, 5 Sep 1999 21:56:22 +0100
> From: "star" <starraysun@...>
> Subject: new to list
>
> Hello - I am unschooling in England.
> I have just joined your list in the last week.
> I want to say how much I am enjoying your mails.
> Lisa's message is GREAT and I am saving it for future reference-thanks
Lisa!
> It's great to know that you are all out there, doing the best for your
kids.
> I am pleased to know that I will be able to get the support I need with my
unschooling.
> Star
>
> When babies are little they like to suck a lot - School always sucks.
>
>
>
>
